amendment.description: An amendment numbered 20 printed in Part B of House Report 118-535 to increase and decrease funding for the purpose of ensuring that the Department of Veterans Affairs maintains sufficient medical care for veterans who reside in US Territories and Freely Associated States.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Kiggans (VA) amendment (A011) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Kiggans (VA) amendment (A011) Agreed to by voice vote.
